languages.text: {n}Обессиливающая старость, вцепившаяся в Абеляра во время пленения в Комморре, отступила. Волосам вернулся цвет, а мышцы подтянулись и укрепились.{/n}

{n}The debilitating agedness that seemed to take root in Abelard during his imprisonment in Commorragh has abated. His hair has regained its colour, and his muscles have built back their strength and tone.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Обессиливающая старость, вцепившаяся в Абеляра во время пленения в Комморре, отступила. Волосам вернулся цвет, а мышцы подтянулись и укрепились.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The debilitating agedness that seemed to take root in Abelard during his imprisonment in Commorragh has abated. His hair has regained its colour, and his muscles have built back their strength and tone.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The debilitating agedness that seemed to take root in Abelard during his imprisonment in Commorragh has abated. His hair has regained its colour, and his muscles have built back their strength and tone.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德身上仿佛生根发芽的老态已经消减了。他的头发已经恢复了原本的颜色，肌肉也恢复了力量，仿佛已经摆脱了科摩罗的影响。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The debilitating agedness that seemed to take root in Abelard during his imprisonment in Commorragh has abated. His hair has regained its colour, and his muscles have built back their strength and tone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德身上仿佛生根发芽的老态已经消减了。他的头发已经恢复了原本的颜色，肌肉也恢复了力量，仿佛已经摆脱了科摩罗的影响。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}El envejecimiento que parecía haber arraigado en Abelard durante su encierro en Commorragh parece haber remitido. Su pelo ha recuperado el color y sus músculos han recuperado su tono y fuerza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The debilitating agedness that seemed to take root in Abelard during his imprisonment in Commorragh has abated. His hair has regained its colour, and his muscles have built back their strength and tone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El envejecimiento que parecía haber arraigado en Abelard durante su encierro en Commorragh parece haber remitido. Su pelo ha recuperado el color y sus músculos han recuperado su tono y fuerza.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}コモラフに幽閉されていた間、アベラルドにまとわりついていたように思われた衰弱と老化が和らいだように思われた。その髪は色づきを取り戻し、筋肉は強さと張りを蘇らせた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The debilitating agedness that seemed to take root in Abelard during his imprisonment in Commorragh has abated. His hair has regained its colour, and his muscles have built back their strength and tone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}コモラフに幽閉されていた間、アベラルドにまとわりついていたように思われた衰弱と老化が和らいだように思われた。その髪は色づきを取り戻し、筋肉は強さと張りを蘇らせた。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Die lähmende Alterung, die während seiner Gefangenschaft in Commorragh Besitz von Abelard ergriffen hatte, ist verflogen. Seine Haaren haben ihre Farbe zurückgewonnen, seine Muskeln haben ihre alte Kraft und ihren alten Tonus wieder.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The debilitating agedness that seemed to take root in Abelard during his imprisonment in Commorragh has abated. His hair has regained its colour, and his muscles have built back their strength and tone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die lähmende Alterung, die während seiner Gefangenschaft in Commorragh Besitz von Abelard ergriffen hatte, ist verflogen. Seine Haaren haben ihre Farbe zurückgewonnen, seine Muskeln haben ihre alte Kraft und ihren alten Tonus wieder.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard semble s'être remis du vieillissement débilitant dont il avait été victime lors de son emprisonnement à Commorragh. Ses cheveux ont retrouvé leur couleur, et la force est revenue dans ses muscles.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The debilitating agedness that seemed to take root in Abelard during his imprisonment in Commorragh has abated. His hair has regained its colour, and his muscles have built back their strength and tone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard semble s'être remis du vieillissement débilitant dont il avait été victime lors de son emprisonnement à Commorragh. Ses cheveux ont retrouvé leur couleur, et la force est revenue dans ses muscles.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Commorragh zindanlarında geçirdiği günlerin ardından yaşlanan Abelard, artık daha genç görünüyor. Ak saçları eski rengine kavuşmuş, kasları yeniden güçlenip tekrardan hacim kazanmış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The debilitating agedness that seemed to take root in Abelard during his imprisonment in Commorragh has abated. His hair has regained its colour, and his muscles have built back their strength and tone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Commorragh zindanlarında geçirdiği günlerin ardından yaşlanan Abelard, artık daha genç görünüyor. Ak saçları eski rengine kavuşmuş, kasları yeniden güçlenip tekrar hacim kazanmış.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
